[!exec:tar] stop

mksourcedir

[windows] unix2dos golden/archive

chezmoi archive --output=archive.tar
exec tar -tf archive.tar
cmp stdout golden/archive

[short] stop

chezmoi archive --gzip --output=archive.tar.gz
exec tar -tzf archive.tar.gz
cmp stdout golden/archive

-- golden/archive --
.bashrc
.binary
.exists
.gitconfig
.hushlogin
.ssh/
.ssh/config
.symlink
